title: A Christian Libertarian clarification
author: VD
content_html: I am occasionally told that I should reverse the terms, since religion trumps politics. I agree with the latter half of that statement. But the truth is that the term is a political one, and it is my Christianity that colors my libertarianism. My libertarianism does not – consciously – color my Christianity. In spiritual or religious terms, I am a Christian. In political terms, I am a Christian Libertarian. Chiaro?
